a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.h1: Welcome to the Central Montcalm Public School District

div.p: We are proud of the many quality educational programs and opportunities that we provide for the learners in our community. Our school district serves approximately 1,600 students and provides educational opportunities through our adult and community education programs.

a.title: View more about Virtual Board Meeting
a.aria-label: Virtual Board Meeting

div.a: Virtual Board Meeting

div.div: Virtual Board Meeting

li.p: As a result of the Governorâ€™s â€œStay at Homeâ€ Executive Order, the special meeting will be conducted remotely via â€œGoogle Hangoutsâ€. Members of the public can join the meeting from a computer, tablet or smartphone. Please email Julie Milewski at jmilewski@central-montcalm.org and a link to the meeting will be sent to you.

The meeting will feature a Public Comment portion. Members of the public wishing to address the Board are asked to sign up prior to the meeting, using the following form: https://forms.gle/P7Ax7pBKCG2jKkBP6.

If youâ€™re having difficulty accessing the form or if during the course of the meeting youâ€™re having technical difficulties, email jmilewski@central-montcalm.org for assistance. Members of the public may also submit a written public comment to be read into the record by emailing ameinhardt@central-montcalm.org. Speakers will be called upon in the order in which they signed up.

div.div: March 18, 2020
2020-2021 District Calendar
March 25, 2019
2019-2020 District Calendar
August 23, 2018
Creating Your New PowerSchool ID for Parents

div.p: CMPS has a new tool called PowerSchool Unified Classroom. This will require parents to set up a new account. Please use the document below to guide you through the steps. Begin by clicking on the PowerSchool ID Set-Up at the top of this webpage.
You can also click here to watch a short video on how to set up your account.
For more information about PowerSchool's Unified Classroom, go to https://docs.powerschool.com/UCHSP
If you are having trouble setting up your account, please complete this form: PS Unified Classroom Support Request

span.a: PDF File Create Your PowerSchool ID for Parents
